quotes.quote: Morality is the basis of things and truth is the substance of all morality.
Morality knows nothing of geographical boundaries, or distinctions of race.
Moral courage is higher and a rarer virtue than physical courage.
Moral excellence comes about as a result of habit. We become just by doing just acts, temperate by doing temperate acts, brave by doing brave acts.
Unless we discover actual truth, morality is up for grabs.
Wrong is wrong even if everyone is doing it. Right is right even if no one is doing it.
The purpose of morality is to teach you, not to suffer and die, but to enjoy yourself and live.
Whenever you are to do a thing, though it can never be known but to yourself, ask yourself how you would act were all the world looking at you, and act accordingly.
Morality is a burglar's tool whose merit lies in never being left behind at the scene of the crime.
Every young man would do well to remember that all successful business stands on the foundation of morality.
Do not depend upon the morality of a person until you have seen him behave while in anger.
Children often have a much stronger concept of morality than adults.
The test of morality of a society is what it does with it's children.
Morality is the thing upon which your friends smile, and immorality is the thing upon which they frown.
Morality is the herd-instinct in the individual.
Morality is of the highest importance - but for us, not for God.
Morality is only moral when it is voluntary.
Do not do an immoral thing for moral reasons.
Morality, like art, means drawing a line someplace.
The quality of moral behavior varies in inverse ratio to the number of human beings involved.
The higher the buildings, the lower the morals.The higher the buildings, the lower the morals.
Morality is simply the attitude we adopt towards people whom we personally dislike.
Morality comes with the sad wisdom of age, when the sense of curiosity has withered.
A man that has lost moral sense is like a man in battle with both of his legs shot off: he has nothing to stand on.
Even if everyone else is not doing good. I alone will. Even if everyone else is doing wrong, I alone will not.
Always do what is right. It will gratify half of mankind and astound the other.
There are no easy answers, but there are simple answers. We must have the courage to do what we know is morally right.
Morality is truth in full bloom.
The best way to teach morality is to make it a habit with children.
It's easy enough to preach morality on a full belly.
